resources.string: Welcome to Laundry Winns, \nthe best place to do your laundry!

Date Time: %4$s 
------------------------------ 
Customer Name: %1$s 
Customer Address: %2$s 
Laundry Weight: %3$s kg 
Total Cost: %5$.2f 
Discount: %6$.2f 
------------------------------ 
Thank you!!!

Laundry Winns is an Android application for laundry services. With this application, you can easily calculate laundry costs and receive a discount if it reaches 5 kilograms.
